title: Add sidebar icons for Aadhaar/PAN entry with inline input fields and auto-fetch

requirements.text: Add two separate icons to the sidebar: one for Aadhaar card entry and one for PAN card entry. Icons should be visually distinct and clearly labeled.

quotes: these two different icons should appear in sidebar

acceptanceCriteria: Two icons appear in the application sidebar
One icon is labeled for Aadhaar card entry
One icon is labeled for PAN card entry
Icons are visually distinct from each other

requirements.text: When either sidebar icon is clicked, display inline input fields for entering the respective card number (Aadhaar or PAN). The input fields should appear directly in the sidebar or adjacent area without navigating away from the current page.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Aadhaar icon displays an inline input field for Aadhaar number
Clicking PAN icon displays an inline input field for PAN number
Input fields appear without page navigation or modal popups
Input fields include appropriate validation and formatting

requirements.text: Implement automatic fetching of investment holdings as soon as valid Aadhaar and PAN numbers are entered. The system should retrieve and display all Aadhaar and PAN linked holdings immediately without requiring additional user action.

quotes: data fetching should be automatically fetching and display all the adhar and pan linked holdings immediately

acceptanceCriteria: Holdings are automatically fetched when both valid Aadhaar and PAN numbers are entered
All linked investments are retrieved from the backend
Holdings display immediately after successful fetch
User receives feedback during the fetching process

requirements.text: Add a manual fetch button that allows users to trigger the holdings retrieval on demand. This button should be available after Aadhaar and PAN numbers have been entered.
acceptanceCriteria: A fetch button is visible after Aadhaar and PAN numbers are entered
Clicking the button triggers holdings retrieval
Button shows loading state during fetch operation
Button is disabled if required card numbers are missing

constraints: Maintain existing DigiLocker integration architecture in backend/main.mo
Preserve earth-tone styling and OKLCH color system
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Keep all backend logic in the single main actor file
nonGoals: Adding new investment types or fields

required: Aadhaar card icon illustration in earth-tone emerald green style (aadhaar-icon.dim_32x32.png)
PAN card icon illustration in earth-tone warm gold style (pan-icon.dim_32x32.png)
